# Stroke

Clean up the data (do not show the code).

```{r, echo=FALSE}
D2 <- readSheet("Stroke")
D2 <- tidyData(D2)
show(D2)
network <- mtc.network(D2)
```


Plot the network.

```{r strokeNetwork}
plot(network)
```

Run the model.

```{r, results='hide'}
M <- mtc.model(network, type="consistency", linearModel="random")
runtime <- system.time(results <- mtc.run(M, n.adapt=5000, n.iter=20000, thin=10))
```

```{r}
runtime
```

Sampler diagnostics.

```{r strokeGelman, fig.height=8}
gelman.plot(results)
gelman.diag(results)
```

```{r strokeTrace, fig.height=10}
plot(results)
```

Summary.

```{r strokeForest}
summary(results)
forest(results)
```

Assess the degree of heterogeneity and inconsistency.

```{r, results='hide'}
anohe <- mtc.anohe(network, n.adapt=5000, n.iter=20000, thin=10)
```

```{r strokeAnohe, fig.height=8}
summary(anohe)
plot(anohe)
```
